item.title: Install Powershell in Mac
item.description: Install brew cask install powershell Run pwsh To update/upgrade later on: brew update brew cask upgrade powershell See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/scripting/install/installing-powershell-core-on-macos?view=powershell-7
